title: Why Choose J&J - JJ Holistic Nutritional Therapy
description: Herbs are mention throughout the Bible both as remedies and for spiritual cleansing. Because they were mentioned in the Bible, some people believe these plants have extraordinary healing powers. There are 128 plants mentioned which were used for food, cosmetics, medicine, and religious ritual. Some herbs, especially shrubs and trees, where made into essential oils.

hero.title: Why Choose J&J Holistic Nutritional Therapy

p.li: The Lord hath created medicines out of the earth; and he that is wise will not abhor them.

Herbs are mention throughout the Bible both as remedies and for spiritual cleansing. Because they were mentioned in the Bible, some people believe these plants have extraordinary healing powers. There are 128 plants mentioned which were used for food, cosmetics, medicine, and religious ritual. Some herbs, especially shrubs and trees, where made into essential oils.
